solidbase.core
Class PatchProcessor

java.lang.Object
  solidbase.core.CommandProcessor
      solidbase.core.PatchProcessor
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConnectionListener
public class PatchProcessor
extends CommandProcessor
implements ConnectionListener

This class is the coordinator. It requests an upgrade path from the PatchFile, and reads commands from it. It calls the CommandListeners, updates the DBVERSION and DBVERSIONLOG tables through DBVersion, calls the Database to execute statements through JDBC, and shows progress to the user by calling ProgressListener.

Since:
Apr 1, 2006 7:18:27 PM
Author:
René M. de Bloois

getTargets

public LinkedHashSet<String> getTargets(boolean tips,
                                        String prefix,
                                        boolean downgradeable)
Returns all possible targets from the current version. The current version is also considered.

Parameters:
tips - If true only the tips of the upgrade paths are returned.
prefix - Only return targets that start with the given prefix.
downgradeable - Also consider downgrade paths.
Returns:
All possible targets from the current version.

                        throws SQLExecutionException
Use the 'setup' change sets to upgrade the DBVERSION and DBVERSIONLOG tables to the newest specification.

Throws:
SQLExecutionException - Whenever an SQLException occurs during the execution of a command.

patch

public void patch(String target,
                  boolean downgradeable)
           throws SQLExecutionException
Patches to the given target version. The target version can end with an '*', indicating whatever tip version that matches the target prefix. This method protects itself against SIGTERMs (CTRL-C).

Parameters:
target - The target requested.
downgradeable - Indicates that downgrade paths are allowed to reach the given target.
Throws:
SQLExecutionException - When the execution of a command throws an SQLException.

                              boolean downgradeable)
                       throws SQLExecutionException
